simple.name: Claude Code GUI Mode
simple.description: Operates as a graphical interface for Claude Code. Uses Claude Code as the execution backend with simplified task input.

expert.name: Standalone Orchestration Mode
expert.description: Full orchestration with PRD generation, multi-agent coordination, and advanced execution strategies. Requires LLM API configuration.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose your preferred color scheme. System follows your OS preference.

llm.title: LLM Backend
llm.description: Select your preferred LLM provider and configure API access.

claude-code.name: Claude Code (Claude Max)
claude-code.description: Use Claude Code as LLM backend. No API key required.

qwen.name: Qwen (DashScope)
qwen.description: 阿里云通义千问 Qwen models.

minimax.name: MiniMax
minimax.description: MiniMax M2 series models with reasoning support.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.title: API Key for {{name}}
apiKey.placeholderConfigured: API key is configured (click eye icon to reveal)

glmEndpoint.label: API Endpoint
glmEndpoint.help: Select the endpoint matching your GLM plan. The Coding endpoint is required for GLM Coding plans.

standard.name: Standard Endpoint
standard.description: General-purpose API endpoint for most GLM plans.

coding.name: Coding Endpoint
coding.description: Dedicated endpoint for GLM Coding plans. Required when using the Coding plan.

model.label: Model
model.help: Choose a built-in model from the dropdown, or add your own custom model.

contextTurns.label: Conversation Context Turns
contextTurns.help: Simple mode standalone backends keep the latest N conversation turns as context.

contextManagement.label: Context Management
contextManagement.compactionHelp: When the conversation context grows too large, automatically summarize older messages to stay within the token budget. This prevents execution failures from context overflow during long analysis tasks.

streaming.label: Streaming Output
streaming.subAgentEventsHelp: Display structured start/end events for delegated exploration and analysis phases.
streaming.reasoningTracesHelp: Off by default. Enable only for debugging verbose model behavior.
streaming.enableThinkingHelp: Enable extended thinking for supported models (Qwen3, QwQ, DeepSeek-R1, etc.). The model will reason through problems step-by-step before responding.

searchProvider.label: Web Search Provider
searchProvider.help: Search provider for the WebSearch tool. Tavily and Brave require API keys (configure above under their respective provider names).

agents.title: Agent Configuration
agents.description: Configure execution agents and their selection strategy.
agents.name: Agent Name
agents.commandHelp: The CLI command to invoke this agent
agents.emptyState: No agents configured. Add an agent to get started.

selection.title: Agent Selection Strategy
selection.smartDescription: AI will choose the best agent for each task type.
selection.preferDefaultDescription: Always use the default agent unless overridden.
selection.manualDescription: You will be prompted to select an agent for each task.

dialog.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

quality.title: Quality Gates
quality.description: Configure quality checks that must pass before a story is marked complete.

typecheck.label: Type Check
typecheck.description: Run type checking (mypy, pyright, tsc) before considering a story complete.

test.label: Tests
test.description: Run tests (pytest, jest, npm test) to verify functionality.

lint.label: Lint
lint.description: Run linting (ruff, eslint) to ensure code quality.

custom.label: Custom Script
custom.description: Run a custom quality check script.

customScript.label: Custom Script
customScript.help: Enter a script or command to run. Exit code 0 means success.

retry.label: Retry Settings
retry.help: Number of times to retry a story if quality gates fail (0-10).

summary.label: Summary
summary.noGates: No quality gates enabled. Stories will be marked complete without validation.
summary.mustPass: Stories must pass {{gates}} to be considered complete. {{retryMessage}}
summary.retryMessage: If gates fail, the agent will retry up to {{count}} time.
summary.retryMessage_plural: If gates fail, the agent will retry up to {{count}} times.

phases.title: Phase Agent Assignment
phases.description: Assign default agents and fallback chains to each execution phase.

fallback.title: Fallback Chain Configuration
fallback.help: If the default agent fails, agents will be tried in order until one succeeds.

info.title: How Phase Assignment Works
info.description: Each execution phase can be assigned a default agent. If that agent fails or is unavailable, the system will try agents from the fallback chain in order. This allows for robust multi-agent orchestration with graceful degradation.

importExport.title: Import & Export
importExport.description: Backup your settings or transfer them to another installation.

export.title: Export Settings
export.description: Download your current settings as a JSON file for backup or transfer.
export.error: Failed to export settings. Please try again.

import.title: Import Settings
import.description: Import settings from a previously exported JSON file.
import.dialogDescription: This will overwrite your current settings. Are you sure you want to continue?
import.error: Failed to import settings. Please try again.
import.invalidFormat: Invalid settings file format. Expected "version" and "settings" fields.
import.parseError: Failed to parse settings file. Please ensure it is valid JSON.

reset.title: Reset to Defaults
reset.description: This will reset all settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
reset.error: Failed to reset settings. Please try again.
